beds24.title: Beds24
beds24.apiKeyInfo: You need an API key to integrate with Beds24
beds24.apiKeyDescription: The API key allows synchronization of availability calendar, prices and bookings between your properties and Beds24.

beds24.loginToBeds24: Log in to your Beds24 account
beds24.apiKeyV2Optional: API V2 is not required, but may be needed for some features in the future

beds24.enterApiKeyV2: Enter your API key V2 (if available)
beds24.verifiedSuccess: API key successfully verified! You can now link properties.
beds24.linkPropertiesDescription: Select properties from your database and link them to rooms in Beds24 for synchronization

propertySearch.title: Property Search
propertySearch.noAccess: You don't have access to this section
propertySearch.lowConfidenceDescription: AI is not fully confident in interpreting your query.
propertySearch.lowConfidenceRecommendation: We recommend clarifying search parameters or viewing detailed interpretation.
propertySearch.startDialogWithAI: Start a dialog with AI to search for properties
propertySearch.aiSearchDescription: Describe what you're looking for in your own words. AI will help find the perfect option.
propertySearch.clientAgentDescription: Communicate with the client through the AI agent. It will answer questions and select options.
propertySearch.searchPlaceholder: For example: 2-bedroom apartment in Kamala area, budget up to 100k baht, check-in December 15 for a month

advancedSearch.searchBelowMax: Search for cheaper or equal to budget
advancedSearch.toleranceTooltip: Tolerance allows searching for properties within ±N days
advancedSearch.searchWithinDays: Search within ±{{days}} days of specified dates
advancedSearch.nightsTooltip: How many nights you want to stay
advancedSearch.searchWindowTooltip: In what period to search for available dates
advancedSearch.searchingNights: Searching for {{duration}} available nights in the specified period
advancedSearch.clickInstruction: Click once for desired, twice for must have
advancedSearch.ownershipInfo: ℹFreehold - full ownership forever. Leasehold - long-term lease (usually 30-90 years). Company - ownership through Thai company.

aiDescriptionGenerator.title: AI Description Generator
aiDescriptionGenerator.conditionsNotMet: Not all conditions for generation are met
aiDescriptionGenerator.pleaseWait: Please wait another {{minutes}} min. before regenerating
aiDescriptionGenerator.featuresAdded: These features were automatically added to the property.
aiDescriptionGenerator.tipDescription: The more data about the property - the better the description will be.
aiDescriptionGenerator.additionalRequirementsDescription: You can specify additional requirements for description generation. This is not mandatory - the description will be generated without them.
aiDescriptionGenerator.additionalPromptPlaceholder: For example: Mention proximity to school, emphasize family-friendly neighborhood, add information about long-term rental possibility...
aiDescriptionGenerator.requirementsNote: These requirements will be added to the main prompt and taken into account when generating the description.

aiInterpretationModal.title: AI Query Understanding
aiInterpretationModal.subtitle: How AI interpreted your query
aiInterpretationModal.mediumAccuracyDescription: AI is not fully confident in query interpretation. It is recommended to check and clarify search parameters.
aiInterpretationModal.noParametersDescription: AI could not extract parameters from your query. Try to formulate the query more specifically or use advanced search.

aiPropertyCreation.title: Create property with AI
aiPropertyCreation.subtitle: Automatic data extraction from text
aiPropertyCreation.howItWorksDescription: Paste a property description from any source (messenger message, listing, notes). AI will automatically recognize and structure all data: characteristics, prices, commissions, occupancy calendar, owner information and download photos from Google Drive.
aiPropertyCreation.placeholder:
For example:

Property Anchan Flora, number 55. Sale price 55M, rent 200k from January to March, otherwise 300k, yearly contract 150k. 2 floors, 500sqm inside, 1000 non-residential, 1200 plot. Freehold. Pets allowed, Bangtao area, 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms, 2 parking spaces.

Features: kitchen, TV, internet, pool, garden. Sea view.

Occupancy: occupied from December 15 to February 5.

Google maps link: https://maps.app.goo.gl/example
Photos: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/example
Owner: Anna, tel +66123456789
aiPropertyCreation.importantDescription: After creating the property, be sure to check all data, especially prices, dates and contact information. AI may make mistakes in interpreting some data.
aiPropertyCreation.fixStep1: Open Google Drive and find the folder with photos
aiPropertyCreation.fixStep3: Change settings to 'Anyone with the link'
aiPropertyCreation.fixStep4: Copy the link and use it in the description
aiPropertyCreation.alternativeOption: Alternative option: upload photos manually after creating the property

aiResponseViewer.title: AI Assistant Response
aiResponseViewer.flexibleSearchDesc: Searching for {{duration}} nights in period from {{start}} to {{end}}
aiResponseViewer.lowConfidenceDescription: We recommend clarifying search parameters for more accurate results

calendarManager.addSyncDesc: Connect calendars from external platforms (Airbnb, Booking.com, etc.)
calendarManager.selectDaysDescription: Click on dates in the calendar that you want to block. You can select any number of dates
calendarManager.selectPeriodDescription: First click on the period start date, then on the end date
calendarManager.selectPeriodEndDescription: Now select the period end date
calendarManager.noCalendarDataDesc: This property has no blocked dates or bookings yet
calendarManager.title: Occupancy Calendar
calendarManager.addPeriodDesc: Block a continuous period of dates (for example, from 1st to 10th)
calendarManager.selectDaysDesc: Select specific individual days on the calendar
calendarManager.selectPeriodRequired: Period or days must be selected
calendarManager.icsCreatedAfter: ICS calendar will be created after saving property
calendarManager.syncCalendarsDesc: Connect calendars from Airbnb, Booking.com and other platforms
calendarManager.noExternalCalendarsDesc: Add external calendars for automatic occupancy synchronization
calendarManager.deleteCalendarDesc: Do you also want to delete dates that were imported from this calendar?
calendarManager.selectDatesOnCalendar: Select dates on calendar by clicking on them
calendarManager.periodHasOccupied: The selected period has {{count}} occupied dates
calendarManager.selectOtherPeriod: Select another period or use force add
calendarManager.reasonPlaceholder: For example: Client booking, Technical maintenance
calendarManager.infoDescription: Selected dates will be marked as occupied in the calendar
calendarManager.howToGetAirbnb: How to get link from Airbnb?
calendarManager.howToGetBooking: How to get link from Booking.com?
calendarManager.airbnbStep1: Log in to your Airbnb account and go to 'Calendar' section
calendarManager.airbnbStep3: Copy the calendar link and paste it in the field above
calendarManager.bookingStep1: Log in to Booking.com extranet and go to 'Calendar' section
calendarManager.bookingStep3: Copy the calendar link and paste it in the field above
calendarManager.noConflictsDesc: All calendars are synchronized correctly, no overlaps
calendarManager.conflictsDetectedDesc: Found dates that are marked as occupied in multiple calendars simultaneously
calendarManager.syncStep1: All active calendars will be loaded and processed
calendarManager.syncStep2: Dates from calendars will be added to the general occupancy calendar
calendarManager.syncStep3: Conflicting dates will be merged (occupancy will be preserved)
calendarManager.syncStep4: Property ICS file will be updated with current data
calendarManager.icsFileCreated: ICS calendar successfully created and ready to use
calendarManager.icsUsage1: Copy the link above and add it to Airbnb, Booking.com or other platforms
calendarManager.icsUsage2: Calendar automatically updates with any occupancy changes
calendarManager.icsUsage3: Use this link to sync with Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, etc.
calendarManager.datesAddedTemporarily: Added {{count}} date(s) temporarily. They will be saved after creating the property.
calendarManager.periodAddedForced: Period forcibly added, conflicting dates removed
calendarManager.minTwoCalendars: At least 2 calendars needed for analysis

seasonalPricing.netDescription: Owner price. You add your commission on top.

seasonDescriptions.low: April-October: low demand, suitable for long-term rental
seasonDescriptions.mid: March, November: moderate demand, transition period
seasonDescriptions.peak: New Year holidays: peak demand, maximum prices
seasonDescriptions.prime: Special events: premium period with maximum prices

seasonType.title: Step 1: Select season type
seasonType.description: Season type helps organize pricing. Each type has its own color coding and price recommendations.

dates.title: Step 2: Specify period dates
dates.description: Enter start and end dates of the season. Format DD-MM (day-month) is used, period will repeat every year.

pricing.title: Step 3: Set prices and conditions
pricing.description: Choose pricing type and specify cost. You can also add minimum number of nights for booking.
pricing.priceDescription: Base price that will be applied during this period
pricing.minNightsDescription: Minimum number of nights for booking in this period

preview.title: Step 4: Preview and save
preview.description: Check all data before saving. You can go back to make changes.
preview.readyMessage: All data is filled correctly. Click the button below to save.

translationsEditor.propertyNameInfoDescription: Property name is specified once in the 'Basic Information' tab and automatically applied to all languages. Only descriptions are edited here.

accounts.title: Information
accounts.description: To create requests through the bot, you need to add at least one active Telegram account. After adding, click 'Synchronize' to authorize.

groups.title: How to get group Chat ID?
groups.description:
1. Add bot to the group
2. Write any message in the group
3. Use special bots (for example @getidsbot) to get Chat ID

users.title: Information
users.description: Only users from this list can use the bot. Telegram ID can be found via @userinfobot

adminChat.notConfiguredDescription: Configure admin chat to receive notifications about request actions

aiAgreementEditor.title: AI Agreement Editor Assistant
aiAgreementEditor.instruction: Describe in Russian what changes need to be made to the agreement. AI will make changes in English and suggest you confirm them before applying.
aiAgreementEditor.placeholder: For example: Add a clause about banning dogs from 1:00 PM to 9:00 PM on the property

confirmChanges.title: Confirm changes
confirmChanges.warning: After applying changes, agreement PDF will be automatically regenerated. This action is irreversible.
confirmChanges.changesCanceled: Changes cancelled. You can continue editing.

success.applied: Changes successfully applied! Agreement PDF is regenerating...
success.complete: Changes applied! Agreement and PDF updated.

htmlGenerator.title: HTML Presentation Generator
htmlGenerator.subtitle: Create professional property presentation for client
htmlGenerator.success: HTML file successfully generated and downloaded
htmlGenerator.step1Info: Choose presentation language and price display mode. HTML file will contain all photos and property information.
htmlGenerator.step2Info: Choose which prices to include in presentation. Unavailable options will be disabled.
htmlGenerator.step3Info: Add markups to prices if necessary. Markups can be specified as percentage or fixed amount.

htmlGenerator.displayModeDescription: Choose which prices to show in presentation
htmlGenerator.forAgentDescription: HTML without company logo and footer
htmlGenerator.bothModeInfo: HTML will contain toggle between rent and sale modes
htmlGenerator.standaloneInfo: HTML file will be fully standalone with all photos in base64 format
